comments:
I see the following exception quite a bit. Several times a day. It seems to 
suggest that there is some code that is not thread safe.

in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".
!STACK 0

Are you still seeing this?  I'm unable to reproduce this and there have been no further reports of it 
occurring in 3.1.  Please reopen if it's still an issue.
